com.github.dandelion.core.asset

Class AssetsConfigurator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dandelion.core.asset.AssetsConfigurator

  • public class AssetsConfigurator
extends Object
    Load Assets configuration
    • assetsLoader :
      • the AssetsLoader found in 'dandelion/dandelion.properties' for key 'assetsLoader'
      • or AssetsJsonLoader by default
    • assets.locations : type of access to assets content(remote [by default], local)
    Default Asset Loader is
